caption.p: Inhibition of SMS1 and SMS2 activities by ( a) DCA ( 1), ( b) derivative ( 4), ( c) derivative ( 6) and ( d) derivative ( 7). IC 50 values were measured using a cell lysate assay. SMS-expressing cell lysates and compounds were incubated for 3 h at 37 °C, and the extracted fluorescent lipids were directly analyzed by HPLC. Each point represents the mean ± SD of triplicate assays.
